meanings.definition: Having a lot of flesh; plump or fat.
meanings.sent1: The pig had a fleshy body with round cheeks.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the fleshy taste of the ripe peach.
meanings.sent3: The fleshy baby giggled as she grabbed her chubby toes.
meanings.sent4: The fleshy clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: His fleshy cheeks turned red from the cold wind.

meanings.sent1: The fleshy mushroom had a soft texture when cooked.
meanings.sent2: The artist sculpted a fleshy heart out of clay.
meanings.sent3: The fleshy steak sizzled on the hot grill.
meanings.sent4: The flower petals felt fleshy to the touch, like delicate skin.
meanings.sent5: Her fleshy lips glistened with lip balm under the sun.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the flesh.
meanings.sent1: The fleshy wound needed a bandage to heal properly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the fleshy parts of the human body.
meanings.sent3: The fleshy smell of the barbecue filled the backyard.
meanings.sent4: His fleshy fingers gripped the steering wheel tightly.
meanings.sent5: The fleshy texture of the fruit made it juicy and delicious.
